metadata.title: CVE-2021-23994 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A WebGL framebuffer was not initialized early enough, resulting in memorycorruption and an out of bound write. This vulnerability affects FirefoxESR < 78.10, Thunderbird < 78.10, and Firefox < 88.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
